attributes.action: insist that all petitions should provide for signatures against as well as for them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Because petitions are drawn up to gain assenting signatures, no opportunity is available to allow people to register disapproval.
This gives a completely unrepresentative weight to the recorded numbers.
Any petition which does not make provision for contrary views should therefore be ignored.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
